ðŸ“– Summary: The Depix repository provides a proof-of-concept technique for recovering plaintext from pixelized screenshots. It focuses on images pixelized with a linear box filter and includes tools for visualizing box detection and generating pixelated images. The repository offers example usages demonstrating how to recover text from images pixelized with different software and settings.
